entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
